summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; increasing an expenditure in the 1980 Budget of the Engineering Department; authorizing the preparation of plans, specifications and estimates, the retention of consultants, construction, and making an approximation from the Sewer Improvement Fund to provide for the connection of a drainage area of approximately 81.5 acres on Bacon Hill with the freeway drain at South Bayview Street (South Bayview Street, Storm Drain Connection Project).
